data.description: Splits files of directory to subdirectories
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module aims at gathering the files from a single level
    directory and moving them subsequently to numbered subdirectories.
    Options are passed as a referenced hash. It's object-orientated at
    the moment, but I might consider using the Exporter module in
    upcoming releases.

    I've submitted a previous application for the registration of the
    namespace within the module list, but my request seems to have been
    neglected for some reason. If you consider my module's namespace to
    be inappropriate or to clash with existing namespaces, then please
    contact me via my cpan address.
